thread.title: Stephanie Davis releases emotional statement hitting back at Jeremy McConnell after he takes DNA test live on TV despite denying he’s the father
thread.title_full: Stephanie Davis releases emotional statement hitting back at Jeremy McConnell after he takes DNA test live on TV despite denying he’s the father

author: rpocklington
title: Stephanie Davis releases emotional statement hitting back at Jeremy McConnell after he takes DNA test live on TV despite denying he’s the father
text:
TV Magazine 'SHE FEELS HUMILIATED' Stephanie Davis releases emotional statement hitting back at Jeremy McConnell after he takes DNA test live on TV despite denying he’s the father 
The actress hit out at her former boyfriend after he took a DNA test on This Morning By REBECCA POCKLINGTON
